attributes.title: Manifest The Being of Paramashiva - Paramashivoham 2.0
attributes.description:
17 MARCH 2020 

IT IS TIME NOW THE BEING OF PARAMASHIVA STARTS MANIFESTING IN ALL OF US. THE TIME IS RIGHT. SO, I AM GOING TO START THE PROCESS FOR MANIFESTING THE BEING OF PARAMASHIVA WITHIN NEXT 3 DAYS. 20TH MARCH I AM GOING TO START THE PROGRAM. WHOEVER WANTS TO ATTEND, YOU CAN ATTEND FORM YOUR HOME. 

*IT WILL BE CONDUCTED THROUGH TWO-WAY VIDEO CONFERENCING. IT IS A WHOLE DAY PROGRAM. IT WILL BE A VERY POWERFUL, INTENSE PROCESS. AKASHA BHAIRAVA IS THE GOD WHO MAKES ALL OUR BEINGS READY FOR PARAMASHIVA TO MANIFEST. 

*IT WILL BE CENTERED ON AKASHA BHAIRAVA AND MAKING PARAMASHIVA MANIFEST IN ALL OF US. TILL NOW, I MANIFESTED AND REVEALED THE STATE, SPACE, POWERS OF PARAMASHIVA. NOW, DIRECT PROCESS DIRECTLY FROM PARAMASHIVA TO MANIFEST THE BEING OF PARAMASHIVA. I CAN CALL IT AS ‘PARAMASHIVOHAM LEVEL 2’, BECAUSE THE WORLD IS READY! 

*NOW IS THE TIME ALL THE BEINGS SHOULD RECEIVE PARAMASHIVA AND ALLOW HIM TO MANIFEST IN ALL OF US. NO TEACHING, NO TECHNIQUE, NO MEDITATION - DIRECT SUPER ALCHEMY PROCESSES. 

*ANYONE WHO IS DOING PACHA PATTINI VRATHAM CAN JOIN. I AM GOING TO MAKE THIS AS DONATION BASED. I AM NOT GOING TO TAG ANY COST FOR IT. BUT I WANT ABSOLUTE COMMITMENT. I DON'T WANT YOU TO COME FOR ONE SESSION, AND NOT COME FOR ANOTHER SESSION. 

*TO BRING SINCERITY AND RESPONSIBILITY, I HAVE ALWAYS SEEN PEOPLE TAKE IT FOR GRANTED WHEN IT IS GIVEN FREELY. 20TH MARCH - 4TH APRIL. FIRST PROGRAM I AM OFFERING AFTER THE GREAT PAUSE DIRECTLY: MANIFESTING THE BEING OF PARAMASHIVOHAM - BEING PARAMASHIVA! PREPARE YOURSELF. CLEAN UP YOURSELF. 

*THE PROGRAM WILL NOT HAVE A SPECIFIC FEE. WHOEVER WANTS, PLEASE APPLY TODAY. FOR SOME IT WILL BE FREE, FOR SOME WE WILL ASK YOU TO PAY. YOU CAN'T PUT ANY MONETARY VALUE FOR IT. THE PROGRAM IS BEYOND EVERYTHING! THE PROGRAM WILL BE GURU DAKSHINA BASED! FOR SOME PEOPLE, NOT ONLY I WILL ALLOW FREE OF COST, I WILL GIVE YOUR FLIGHT TICKET TO REACH THE NEAREST AADHEENAM! FOR SOME PEOPLE I MAY ALLOW FROM YOUR HOME. FOR SOME PEOPLE, I MAY SAY, ‘PAY 10 DOLLAR’, OR FOR SOME, ‘100 DOLLAR’, OR FOR SOME, ‘100,000 DOLLAR’ OR FOR SOME, ‘2 MILLION DOLLAR!’ THE PRICE TAG IS WHAT COMES COMES FROM MY MOUTH, MY BEING, THAT’S ALL.

*THE INTENSE ENERGY PARAMASHIVA IS MANIFESTING THROUGH THIS BEING WILL BE MANIFESTED IN EVERY ONE. IF 10,000 OF US CAN SIT TOGETHER AND MANIFEST THE BEING OF PARAMASHIVA, NOT ONLY WE CAN HEAL CORONA VIRUS, IT WILL GIVE SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO THE WORLD. 

*THE WHOLE PROGRAM WILL BE BASED ON MULTIDIMENSIONAL LOGIC. I WILL INTRODUCE THE LOGIC AND THE LIFESTYLE, THE WAY OF EXISTENCE OF KAILASA, TO ALL OF US. WHATEVER I WAS TALKING AFTER THE GREAT PAUSE, I AM GOING TO MAKE ALL OF THAT INTO A REALITY. IT WILL BE A 16-DAYS PROGRAM, FROM MARCH 20TH TO APRIL 4TH. 

*ALL KAILASAVASIS, PREPARE ALL MONASTERIES TO OPEN FOR PARAMASHIVOHAM LEVEL 2 PROGRAM AND FOR ALL OF YOU TO ATTEND IT ALSO. YOU WILL LITERALLY SEE ME EVERYWHERE CONDUCTING AND ATTENDING THE PROGRAM. 

*ONE THING I WILL GUARANTEE YOU: YOU WILL NOT EXIST AT THE END OF THE PROGRAM. ONLY PARAMASHIVA WILL BE THERE! 

*THIS WILL BE THE MOST LIFE POSITIVE HAPPENING ON PLANET EARTH. 

*I AM GOING TO REVEAL ALL THE SCIENCES OF PARAMASHIVA. I AM GOING TO RELEASE THE FULL MOVIE, THE FULL BEING OF PARAMASHIVOHAM! INTANGIBLE BUT DEFINITIVE EXPERIENCES AND SCIENCE OF THE COSMOS IS VEDAS AND AGAMAS. PARAMASHIVA IS GOING TO MANIFEST HIS VERY BEING IN ALL OF US. 

*FOR NEXT THREE DAYS TILL 21ST MARCH, THERE MAY NOT BE LIVE SATSANG. WHETHER FROM HOME OR FROM OUR AADHEENAMS, WE NEED 10,000 PEOPLE TO SIT AND ATTEND THIS PROGRAM, WHICH WILL GIVE A SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO THE WHOLE WORLD! 

*START ENROLLING AND ENRICHING PEOPLE FOR THE NEXT THREE DAYS. THIS IS GOING TO BE THE GREAT HAPPENING FOR THE WHOLE UNIVERSE. WHOEVER TRUSTS AND ACCEPTS ME AS THEIR GURU, I RECOMMEND YOU TO TAKE OFF THESE 16 DAYS. I AM GOING TO BE SITTING WITH YOU LITERALLY THE WHOLE DAY. I AM VERY SERIOUS. THAT IS WHY THERE IS NO PRICE TAG TO THIS PROGRAM. IF POSSIBLE, GET YOUR PETS ALSO BECAUSE THEY ARE ALSO BEINGS. 

*ONLY IF PARAMASHIVA CHOOSES YOU, YOU WILL BE ABLE TO ATTEND THIS PROGRAM. MAKE THE DECISION TO ATTEND PARAMASHIVOHAM FROM SIMPLE INTEGRITY. 

Register at: http://paramashivoham.org/level2
